Title: Requires certain eligible persons or entities to acquire and possess opioid antagonists
Summary: Requires certain eligible persons or entities to acquire and possess opioid antagonists for emergency treatment of a person appearing to experience an opioid-related overdose.
LawCode: Add ยง3000-g, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring certain eligible persons or entities to acquire and possess opioid antagonists
